1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In 1519 the Mayan priest Ahzac curses the white man for having stolen the offering of the maid Ixmy: "No one who has the Black Pearl in his hands will know happiness." In 1987 in Cozumel, Hernán and Analy live a great love, they wait for their first child. While Analy gives birth to a beautiful girl Aymar, Hernán suffers an accident for having found the Black Pearl at the bottom of the sea. The curse is fulfilled through the times.

His wife María Teresa, because she feels lonely, tricks him with Victor and decides to leave Eliseo and his three children: David, Nicolás and Leonardo. Hernán is about to die and makes Eliseo Bravo promise to protect Analy, Hernán dies and Analy suffers from the loss, but will be willing to fight for his daughter supported by Captain Pablo Solís, Rigo and Tacho, children who are supportive and loyal with her.
